item.title: The Holocene
item.description: Holocene meaning “Recent Whole” Post-glacial geological epoch of past 10-12 thousand years. 1 Footnotes Quoted from the “Anthropocene” by Paul Crutzen and Eugene F.

item.title: Welcome to my KyberGarden
item.description: I am Aerith Netzer, the nominal Digital Publishing and Repository Librarian at Northwestern. This is part notebook, blog, and portfolio for my works in my professional and personal knowledge acquisition.

item.title: The Creative Mind
item.description: The Creative Mind is the first section of the first part of The Long Revolution.

item.title: The Long Revolution Part I
item.description: Part 1 of The Long Revolution gives groundwork for the analysis of future parts of the book.

item.title: The Long Revolution
item.description: The Long Revolution is a book by Raymond Williams that seeks to analyze the perpetual revolutions in which we tend to find ourselves in modernity. Part I.

item.title: LibLog 1
item.description: I have decided that I will be doing a sort of dev log for librarians. I would not be so bold as to call myself a developer per se, but I would call myself at least a dabbler in programming for the web and some applications.
